title: I have a Pixel 4a with Android 11 and yesterday I noticed that the media player is gone
content:
I have just noticed that the media player that used to play on my 4a running 11 has gone.  I have a added a widget castbox but I cant see what else I could of done?  I have checked the settings

Sounds / Media and toggled on/off HIde Player when the media session has expired

Thanks all :)
